name: Cosmic Paranoia Passive T3
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Inflict Paranoia on a random enemy until they die at the start of battle and at the start of your turn
Paranoid enemies cannot gain beneficial effects, miss all attacks unless they are Perfect Attacks and take a random amount of Additional Random Damage based on their MAX HP and MISSING HP every turn
This effect does not apply to bosses
Prevent all enemies from blocking incoming damage for allies until they die at the start of battle and at the start of your turn
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to the Fear Of The Dark Eddie, Dark Road Eddie, X Factor Eddie or The Edless Horseman characters.
